Smooth Voxel Modeling    Problem    Progress    Meeting Note

Problem

Overview

(We first discuss 2D case only. ) Consider a $ w\times h$ binary image $I$ contains a single shape, and it’s polygon representation $S$. Pixels in $I$ can be classified into shape pixels $P_s$ (white) and background pixels $P_b$ (black).

Our goal is given the shape pixels $P_s$, we want to recover it’s shape polygon $S$.
